channel.title: Tooling on Jimmy's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Tooling on Jimmy's Blog

item.title: Intellij Idea Shortcut
item.description: Overview I recently moved to Intellij Idea as my IDE for development. It’s simple to use and feature packed. The only downsides are it’s expensive, and it may take a little bit of time to start up. That’s said, there is a learning curve as with migrating to any new IDE. There post goes through some of th basics on how to use Intellij Idea more effective to boost your daily productivity.
